subject: Dear Sir/Ma,
body:
Dear Sir/Ma,
Thank you for your email.
Please see attached Document for your urgent attention.
Yours Faithfully,
Mr. Jones Griffith.
Chairman, Financial Conduct Authority (FCA)
United Kingdom
Tel: +44 745 229 3442
Please Reply To-: 
consultfca@consultant.com

subject: Re: Dear Sir/Ma,
body:
Dear Mr. Jones Griffith,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your email and the attached document. However, before I proceed, could you please provide me with some more information about the nature of this document and why it requires my urgent attention? I want to make sure I fully understand the situation.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Alvaro
